Genarate metacells from TAD methylation

Source: R/mc.R
sc5mc.generate_metacells.Rd

Genarate metacells from TAD methylation

sc5mc.generate_metacells(db, tad_intervs, knn = 80, k_expand = 10,
  min_cluster_size = 20, n_resamp = 1000, seed = NULL, K = 50,
  min_mc_size = 30, min_tad_cov = 10, min_tad_cells = 50,
  min_tads = 1000, tads_meth = NULL)

Arguments

db

cgdb object
tad_intervs

intervals set of TADs
knn

knn
k_expand

k_expand
min_cluster_size

min_cluster_size
n_resamp

n_resamp
seed

seed
K

K
min_mc_size

min_mc_size
min_tad_cov

min_tad_cov
min_tad_cells

min_tad_cells
min_tads

min_tads
tads_meth

previously computed methylation of TADS (using get_tads_meth)

Value

list with the following fields: mc_map, tads_clust, tads_meth, tads_meth_f, tads_mc
